languages.text: "Муаран... жив? И заключил союз с мон-кай?" {n}Провидец недоверчиво косится, стараясь разглядеть ложь в ваших глазах.{/n} "Моя душа поет от осознания, что он сумел отыскать безопасное прибежище. И все же делить мир с мон-кай... едва ли у него был большой выбор".

traits.locale_text: "Муаран... жив? И заключил союз с мон-кай?" {n}Провидец недоверчиво косится, стараясь разглядеть ложь в ваших глазах.{/n} "Моя душа поет от осознания, что он сумел отыскал безопасное прибежище. И все же делить мир с мон-кай... едва ли у него был большой выбор".
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Muaran... is alive? And made a pact with a mon-keigh?" {n}The Farseer looks at you askance, trying to glean the falsehood in your eyes.{/n} "My soul sings with joy at the knowledge that he has found a safe haven. And yet, sharing a world with mon-keigh... I doubt he had much of a choice."
languages.original_text: "Муаран... жив? И заключил союз с мон-кай?" {n}Провидец недоверчиво косится, стараясь разглядеть ложь в ваших глазах.{/n} "Моя душа поет от осознания, что он сумел отыскать безопасное прибежище. И все же делить мир с мон-кай... едва ли у него был большой выбор".

And yet, sharing a world with mon-keigh... I doubt he had much of a choice."

languages.text: «¿Muaran... vive? ¿Y ha hecho un pacto con {mf|un|una} mon-keigh?». {n}El vidente te mira con recelo, buscando algún indicio de mentira en tus ojos.{/n} «Mi alma canta de júbilo sabiendo que ha encontrado un refugio seguro. Mas a pesar de todo, tener que compartir un mundo con los mon-keigh... En fin, dudo que tuviese mucha alternativa».
languages.original_text: "Muaran... is alive? And made a pact with a mon-keigh?" {n}The Farseer looks at you askance, trying to glean the falsehood in your eyes.{/n} "My soul sings with joy at the knowledge that he has found a safe haven. And yet, sharing a world with mon-keigh... I doubt he had much of a choice."

traits.locale_text: ¿Muaran... vive? ¿Y ha hecho un pacto con {mf|un|una} mon-keigh?». {n}El vidente te mira con recelo, buscando algún indicio de mentira en tus ojos.{/n} «Mi alma canta de júbilo sabiendo que ha encontrado un refugio seguro. Mas a pesar de todo, tener que compartir un mundo con los mon-keigh... En fin, dudo que tuviese mucha alternativa».
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: 「ムアランは…生きているのか？しかもモン＝ケイと契約を結んだだと？」{n}先見司は不審そうにあなたを見て、あなたの目の中にある嘘を読み取ろうとしている。{/n} 「彼が安全な避難所を見つけたと知って、私の魂は喜びで歌っている。だが、モン＝ケイと惑星を分け合うだなんて…よほど選択の余地がなかったと思う」
languages.original_text: "Muaran... is alive? And made a pact with a mon-keigh?" {n}The Farseer looks at you askance, trying to glean the falsehood in your eyes.{/n} "My soul sings with joy at the knowledge that he has found a safe haven. And yet, sharing a world with mon-keigh... I doubt he had much of a choice."

traits.locale_text: 「ムアランは…生きているのか？しかもモン＝ケイと契約を結んだだと？」{n}先見司は不審そうにあなたを見て、あなたの目の中にある嘘を読み取ろうとしている。{/n} 「彼が安全な避難所を見つけたと知って、私の魂は喜びで歌っている。だが、モン＝ケイと惑星を分け合うだなんて…よほど選択の余地がなかったと思う」
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: “穆兰……还活着？还和猴子签订了盟约？”{n}先知斜视着你，试图从你的目光中看出你是否在说谎。{/n}“得知他找到了安全的避风港，我的心不由欢喜歌唱。不过，与猴子共同生活在同一个世界……我怀疑他恐怕别无选择。”
languages.original_text: "Muaran... is alive? And made a pact with a mon-keigh?" {n}The Farseer looks at you askance, trying to glean the falsehood in your eyes.{/n} "My soul sings with joy at the knowledge that he has found a safe haven. And yet, sharing a world with mon-keigh... I doubt he had much of a choice."

traits.locale_text: “穆兰……还活着？还和猴子签订了盟约？”{n}先知斜视着你，试图从你的目光中看出你是否在说谎。{/n}“得知他找到了安全的避风港，我的心不由欢喜歌唱。不过，与猴子共同生活在同一个世界……我怀疑他恐怕别无选择。”
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: « Muaran... est en vie ? Et il a conclu un pacte avec {mf|un|une} mon-keigh ? » {n}Le Grand Prophète vous regarde avec méfiance, comme s'il tentait de détecter de la fausseté dans vos yeux.{/n} « Quelle joie que d'apprendre qu'il a trouvé un refuge... Et pourtant, partager un monde avec {mf|un|une} mon-keigh... Je doute fort qu'il ait eu le choix. »
languages.original_text: "Muaran... is alive? And made a pact with a mon-keigh?" {n}The Farseer looks at you askance, trying to glean the falsehood in your eyes.{/n} "My soul sings with joy at the knowledge that he has found a safe haven. And yet, sharing a world with mon-keigh... I doubt he had much of a choice."

traits.locale_text: « Muaran... est en vie ? Et il a conclu un pacte avec {mf|un|une} mon-keigh ? » {n}Le Grand Prophète vous regarde avec méfiance, comme s'il tentait de détecter de la fausseté dans vos yeux.{/n} « Quelle joie que d'apprendre qu'il a trouvé un refuge... Et pourtant, partager un monde avec {mf|un|une} mon-keigh... Je doute fort qu'il ait eu le choix. »
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Muaran ... lebt noch? Und hat einen Pakt mit {mf|einem|einer} Chem-Pan-Sey geschlossen?" {n}Der Runenprophet blickt dich misstrauisch an und versucht in deinen Augen zu erkennen, ob du die Unwahrheit sprichst.{/n} "Meine Seele singt vor Freude, dass ein paar von ihnen einen Zufluchtsort gefunden haben. Trotzdem, eine Welt mit Chem-Pan-Sey zu teilen ... Ich bezweifle, dass er eine echte Wahl hatte."
languages.original_text: "Muaran... is alive? And made a pact with a mon-keigh?" {n}The Farseer looks at you askance, trying to glean the falsehood in your eyes.{/n} "My soul sings with joy at the knowledge that he has found a safe haven. And yet, sharing a world with mon-keigh... I doubt he had much of a choice."

traits.locale_text: "Muaran ... lebt noch? Und hat einen Pakt mit {mf|einem|einer} Chem-Pan-Sey geschlossen?" {n}Der Runenprophet blickt dich misstrauisch an und versucht in deinen Augen zu erkennen, ob du die Unwahrheit sprichst.{/n} "Meine Seele singt vor Freude, dass ein paar von ihnen einen Zufluchtsort gefunden haben. Trotzdem, eine Welt mit Chem-Pan-Sey zu teilen ... Ich bezweifle, dass er eine echte Wahl hatte."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Muaran... Yaşıyor mu? Bir de bir mon-keigh'le anlaşma mı yaptı?" {n}Ötesezen, sana şüpheyle bakarak gözlerinden yalan söylediğini anlamaya çalışıyor.{/n} "Güvenli bir sığınak bulduğunu öğrendim ya, ruhum mutluluktan şakıyor. Mon-keighlerle aynı dünyayı paylaşma kısmına gelirsek... Pek bir seçeneği olduğundan kuşkuluyum."
languages.original_text: "Muaran... is alive? And made a pact with a mon-keigh?" {n}The Farseer looks at you askance, trying to glean the falsehood in your eyes.{/n} "My soul sings with joy at the knowledge that he has found a safe haven. And yet, sharing a world with mon-keigh... I doubt he had much of a choice."

traits.locale_text: "Muaran... Yaşıyor mu? Bir de bir mon-keigh ile anlaşma mı yaptı?" {n}Ötesezen, şüpheyle sana bakarak gözlerinden yalan söylediğine dair bir anlam çıkarmaya çalışıyor.{/n} "Güvenli bir sığınak bulduğunu öğrendim ya, ruhum mutluluktan âdeta şakıyor. Yine de mon-keighlerle aynı dünyayı paylaşma kısmı... Çok fazla seçeneği olduğundan kuşkuluyum."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer
